--- alter_change_stream_set_drop_for_all.sql
ALTER CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name DROP FOR ALL

--- AST
&ast.AlterChangeStream{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 20,
    NameEnd: 38,
    Name:    "change_stream_name",
  },
  Watch:    []*ast.ChangeStreamWatch(nil),
  WatchAll: false,
  DropAll:  true,
  Options:  []ast.Expr(nil),
}

--- SQL
ALTER CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name DROP FOR ALL
